data.eml:eml: Taxonomic notes on Western Palaearctic Conopidae (Diptera)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Stuke, Jens-Hermann (2016): Taxonomic notes on Western Palaearctic Conopidae (Diptera). Zootaxa 4178 (4): 521-534, DOI: http://doi.org/10.11646/zootaxa.4178.4.4
